title: AI boom drives US & China stocks, but Indian market stays in holding pattern: Arvind Sanger
description: US stock market shows signs of fatigue. Investors are waiting for the Federal Reserve's rate cut decisions. Artificial intelligence drives growth in US and China. Geosphere Capital's Arvind Sanger advises caution due to volatility. He highlights India's GST efforts but notes global challenges. Energy demand is stable. Buying opportunities exist in India amid global uncertainty. Clarity on trade is crucial.
content:

title: US Stocks Halt Slide as Traders Eye New Catalysts: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- US equity futures steadied after signs of fatigue in the artificial-intelligence-driven rally caused two days of losses on Wall Street, with traders awaiting new catalysts for stocks’ next move.
content:
(Bloomberg) — US equity futures steadied after signs of fatigue in the artificial-intelligence-driven rally caused two days of losses on Wall Street, with traders awaiting new catalysts for stocks’ next move.

title: AI may deepen Philippine digital divide without reforms-say experts
description: Experts at a Philippine conference warn that artificial intelligence could widen the digital divide. They call on the government to strengthen data systems, expand connectivity, and implement safeguards to ensure fair access.
content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) could worsen the digital divide in the Philippines unless the government quickly strengthens data systems, expands digital connectivity, and implements safeguards, experts said at a conference on Sept. 18, 2025.

title: Tokyo Game Show opens with record 1,100 exhibitors, indie developers in spotlight
description: The Tokyo Game Show, one of the world's biggest gaming events, kicked off Thursday with a record 1,136 exhibitors from Japan and abroad, highlighting the growing presence of independent developers that create small-budget, innovative titles and the increasing application of artificial intelligence. title: Cloudflare launches new policy to stop Google AI from using website content without consent
description: Cloudflare has introduced its Content Signals Policy, which will not allow website owners to set boundaries on how Google and other artificial intelligence systems handle their published material.
content: Cloudflare is introducing a new policy that directly targets Google’s AI operations, particularly its AI Overviews feature. Google has been called out many times by publishers for using their content without authorisation to train AI and across the w... [2716 chars]

description: A Sacramento-area city is making a multi-million-dollar push to become a new hub for artificial intelligence research.
content:

title: Elon Musk Is Looking For Help In Building Macrohard, The AI Software Company That Could 'Simulate' Microsoft
description: Elon Musk is hiring for Macrohard, his new AI-driven software venture he says could rival Microsoft by running entirely on artificial intelligence.
content:
